overview: You can expect something special from a Modelling Agency run by the sexy Alexis Crystal, and together with her photographer Chloe Lamour and models Katy Rose, Eveline Dellai, Venera-maxima and Stacy Cruz, they sure know how to put on one hell of a show! Stylist Lutro is living every guy’s dream, getting to work up close and personal with Stacy and Venera, and Chloe is the kind of photographer that will never hesitate to join in a shoot as she does with Eveline and Angelo Godshack. What for Alexis though? She’s the kind of boss we’d all love to have and you can find out why right here in Private Gold, Lingerie Models Agency!
title: Lingerie Models Agency
